CustomField.description: Query string used to query records. This should NOT include any binded variables. Any dynamic alterations to this query should be handled in a CPQ Rule.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Query string used to query records. This should NOT include any binded variables. Any dynamic alterations to this query should be handled in a CPQ Rule. Ensure all fields from the Record Display Fields field are also included here.
CustomField.label: Query String
